there are 65 ship plying galapagos water ranging in size from 8 to 100 passenger all but a handful carry 20 or fewer passenger weve been personally helping people find the ship most suited to their travel style since 1999 one of the thing we recommend the most is to choose a smaller ship galapagos is about getting out and about among the dispersed island  and a shipbased approach is best for that but it also about ensuring that all the element are in place that allow you to develop a real sense of intimacy with the wildlife and the landscape and to experience them at your own pace on large ship youll find that you will be herded around on a tight schedule naturalist guide can accompany no more than 16 people at a time meaning that on a 100 passenger ship youll have up to 7 group to be managed at each visitor site that mean no lingering everyone ha to move along getting people on  off the ship is an exercise in logistics with the ship loudspeaker constantly announcing which group ha to be where and when that is not what galapagos should be on a small ship there is a lot more room for serendipity for lingering for taking advantage of rare wildlife display a superpod of dolphin lets make a beeline for it waved albatross chick about to fledge lets wait around to watch them its a lot more zen  and zen is where you want to get to when youre out and about among the island there are top quality luxury small ship in galapagos that are wellworth considering celebrity  natgeo are the big corporate boy that we inadvertently bump into thanks to their big advertising budget and because they are the only one that your local travel agent find in their global cruise ship database before committing it well worth onsidering ship like the grace theory integrity and other such top end vessel if youre into that price range of course there are many very good small ship with excellent service le the white glove and polished brass for 3000 le  person than celebrity  natgeo there are some good travel company out there that specialize in galapagos we are one  but were not alone its worth at least talking to them first before opting for celebrity  natgeo at the end of the day you may still opt for one of those ship but galapagos is a once in a lifetime destination and it worth exploring your option before committing
